resources.string: Please enter an email id to sign up with.
Please enter a valid email address.
This email already has an account! Please log in, or use a different email.
Please enter a password for your account.
Please make sure both passwords are matching!
Password may only contain allowing characters [A–Za–z0–9]
Password must contain 6 or more characters.
Please enter an email to login with.
Password field cannot be left empty!
This email is not registered. Please sign up.
